1. Make sure your system has python 3.9x installed 
2. Download the ICAeventsScraper.exe 
3. After download, copy/paste the .exe into a directory 
	(For instance, a new directory in your desktop)
4. Inside the created/current directory double-click/run as administrator the ICAeventsScraper.exe 
5. Wait until two files (.csv .xlsx) appear inside this directory.
	(both files are named ica_events respectively)
6. Open the file of your choice (i.e. ica_events.csv or ica_events.xlsx)
7. Verify that the grabed information is coherent with the parent information (i.e. webpage source of scraped data)
